resources.string: Hello, you are being greeted by the creator of the "IQuestor" application. This application is a quest game in which you have to go through the path of a soldier, making various choices that will directly effect the continuation of the game. The main goal is to rise from private to general.

At the very top left, there is an icon that looks like a planet, and if you click on it, a window will appear in which you must select which language you want to change the game interface to. In Russian, or in English.

To control the volume, there is a sound icon at the top. By default, background music is turned on, but when you press this button, it will turn off and the icon will change. When pressed again, the music in the background will resume playing where it left off.
3) How to sign-out or change account?

To change or log out of your account, click on the logout button in the very top right corner. When you click on it, a menu will appear in which you need to click “yes”. You will then be taken to the registration menu.
4) Where can I read about the game?

In the main menu, by clicking on the bottom button that says “ABOUT US”, you will be taken to a page where everything is described in detail about the game and its developer. Also there you will find the developer’s contact information so that if you need to contact him.
Hello, youve turned 18 and joined the army! Your rank is Private. To rise in rank, you need to follow the right path by making various choices! (Tap here to continue)

(All ranks - Private, Lance Corporal, Junior Sergeant, Sergeant, Staff Sergeant, Warrant Officer, Staff Warrant Officer, Junior Lieutenant, Senior Lieutenant, Captain, Major, Colonel, Major General, General.) (Tap here to continue)

string-array.name: stories1
string-array.item: The Sergeant noticed you during cleanup and praised you. The next day, you took the oath and became {rank + 1}!
After cleanup, the Sergeant noticed you did nothing and reported you to the Warrant Officer. You were punished.
Times have changed. Youve been sent to prison. Defeat at the rank of {rank}.

string-array.name: stories2
string-array.item: You accidentally bumped into the Junior Sergeant, and you were sent to prison. Defeat at the rank of {rank}.
You hit all the targets. The Senior Lieutenant noticed you, and you became {rank + 1}.
You were shot for treason against the homeland. Defeat at the rank of {rank}.

string-array.name: stories3
string-array.item: The Captain came and saw your actions. He thanked you, and the next day, your rank was raised. You became {rank + 1}.
You were all sent to prison. Defeat at the rank of {rank}.
Everyone involved in the brawl was sent to prison, while you went back to the barracks.

string-array.name: stories4
string-array.item: You were taken to the border. Those who attempted to escape were shot.
You were caught and shot for treason against the homeland. Defeat at the rank of {rank}.
You were pacified and taken to the border.

string-array.name: stories5
string-array.item: You were surrounded. All soldiers perished. Defeat at the rank of {rank}.
You managed to hold out for a while, and reinforcements arrived. You repelled the first attack, and your rank was raised to {rank + 1}.
You were killed. Defeat at the rank of {rank}.

string-array.name: stories6
string-array.item: You marched into certain death. Defeat at the rank of {rank}.
You returned to the trenches, where you found mortars. You destroyed all tanks, and your rank was raised to {rank + 1}.
The tanks passed you by, and then you successfully destroyed them from behind. You were promoted to the rank of {rank + 1}.

string-array.name: stories7
string-array.item: You retreated and surrendered the land. The Major General turned out to be a traitor, and he was killed. Your rank was demoted to {rank - 1}.
The Major General turned out to be a traitor, and he was killed. You were promoted twice in rank, and you became {rank + 2}.
You were taken prisoner. Defeat at the rank of {rank}.

string-array.name: stories8
string-array.item: You only shot down 1 aircraft, and the remaining planes killed three soldiers. Your rank was demoted twice to {rank - 2}.
You successfully shot down all aircraft. The mission was accomplished, so you were promoted to the rank of {rank + 1}.
The aircraft prevented you from leaving the shelter, and you were surrounded. Defeat at the rank of {rank}.

string-array.name: stories9
string-array.item: You broke through the defense but lost many soldiers. You were demoted by one rank to {rank - 1}.
You managed to pass unnoticed, avoiding contact with the enemy. For such skill, you were promoted to {rank + 1}.
The attempt to negotiate failed, and you were taken prisoner. Defeat at the rank of {rank}.

string-array.name: stories10
string-array.item: You successfully attacked the enemy and took their positions. You were promoted to {rank + 1}.
The enemy proved to be stronger, and you were forced to retreat. You were demoted by one rank to {rank - 1}.
Your negotiations led to a temporary truce. You were left at your current rank.

string-array.name: stories11
string-array.item: The covert mission was successful. You were promoted to {rank + 1}.
The sabotage operation led to significant disruptions behind enemy lines. You were promoted to {rank + 1}.
You were transferred to another direction without a change in rank.

string-array.name: stories12
string-array.item: You successfully organized the defense and repelled the enemy attack. You were promoted to {rank + 1}.
You were killed during one of the operations. Defeat at the rank of {rank}.
You were sent to prison for disobeying orders. Defeat at the rank of {rank}.

string-array.name: stories13
string-array.item: You declined the rank of general and successfully left military life at the rank of {rank}.
You became the General of the entire countrys army, bearing immense responsibility. Most importantly, you achieved your goal and became a General. Congratulations on completing the game!
You unlocked the secret ending where you killed the minister, but aliens arrived and abducted you.

string-array.name: sit
string-array.item: You went to the barracks, where you need to make your bed and clean your shoes.
During the exercises, everyone was given weapons and ordered to shoot at targets.
One day, a fight broke out in the mess hall.
At night, when everyone was asleep, a military alarm was sounded. It turned out that war had begun. Youre all being taken to the border.
The enemy army is approaching. Something urgent needs to be done!
You initiated an attack, but tanks started moving against you. You need to get out of this situation.
An order came from the Major General to retreat.
Three enemy aircraft are flying in the sky. You were ordered to shoot them down at any cost.
You found yourself in a difficult situation, surrounded by enemy forces. You have to make a tough choice.
After that, you were transferred to a new direction. You will have to fight again.
After prolonged battles, you encountered an unforeseen challenge.
After successful operations and decisive actions, you caught the attention of a General. He gave you a new task.
The war is over, and you became a hero of the country. The Ministry of Defense of your country offered you the rank of general.

string-array.name: choices1
string-array.item: a) Do everything that needs to be done.
b) Leave everything as it is and go rest.
c) Make someone else do everything for you.

string-array.name: choices2
string-array.item: a) Not to try and do everything carelessly.
b) Try to shoot at targets.
c) Shoot the commander.

string-array.name: choices3
string-array.item: a) Try to calm everyone down.
b) Start fighting too.
c) Do nothing.

string-array.name: choices4
string-array.item: a) Do nothing.
b) Try to escape.
c) Panic and disturb everyone.

string-array.name: choices5
string-array.item: a) Gather all soldiers and retreat.
b) Resist until the end.
c) Surrender as prisoners.

string-array.name: choices6
string-array.item: a) Gather everyone and go towards the tanks.
b) Retreat and go back to the trenches.
c) Hide in the forest.

string-array.name: choices7
string-array.item: a) Follow the order and retreat.
b) Fight to the end.
c) Try to negotiate.

string-array.name: choices8
string-array.item: a) Start shooting at them with a rifle.
b) Spend ALL ammunition on them.
c) Hide.

string-array.name: choices9
string-array.item: a) Try to break through the enemy defense.
b) Try to sneak unnoticed behind enemy lines.
c) Try to negotiate a ceasefire with the enemy.

string-array.name: choices10
string-array.item: a) Advance and attack the enemy position.
b) Take defensive positions and wait for the enemy.
c) Try to organize peace talks.

string-array.name: choices11
string-array.item: a) Go on a secret mission behind enemy lines.
b) Participate in a sabotage operation in the enemys rear.
c) Request to be assigned to a different direction.

string-array.name: choices12
string-array.item: a) Organize the defense of a key facility.
b) Conduct operations to eliminate enemy command posts.
c) Refuse and do nothing.

string-array.name: choices13
string-array.item: a) Refuse.
b) Agree.
